thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 20 of 3553
thread.title: Ashley

author: Ashley
title: Ashley
text: ThriftBooks is amazing because who doesn't want a huge selection of books at very low prices that are delivered straight to your house?! The only thing I can even complain about a little is how the books where shipped. I ordered 8 books and got them in 4 or 5 different shipments. Of course, I loved the fast shipping and sending what was available quickly. But at the same time, they could've saved on shipping materials if all 8 had been shipped together. However, the packing they use is 100% recycleable, so that helps. Bottom line, awesome company!
